description: Officers caught a businessman unloading the masks from a lorry into a house in St Denis near Paris.
title: Coronavirus: French police seize 140,000 black market masks
title_page: Coronavirus: French police seize 140,000 black market masks - BBC News
maintext: In the US, members of the public have been advised to use clean cloth or fabric to cover their faces whilst in public. Officials have stressed that medical masks are in short supply and should be left for healthcare workers.
